channel.title: You missed ron's b-day omfg!
channel.description:
Say happy b-day to the best g-mod ever:
Ron!!
Happy bday Ron.

item.title: You missed ron's b-day omfg!

I missed his bday?

item.title: You missed ron's b-day omfg!
item.dc:creator: @Thebeanie TheBeanie
item.description:
@Thebeanie wrote:

[quote=“ThAt0n36Uy, post:71, topic:155444”][quote author=TheBeanie link=topic=212191.msg1863288#msg1863288 date=1194074614]

[quote author=frank_ link=topic=212191.msg1863224#msg1863224 date=1194073520]

[quote author=TheBeanie link=topic=212191.msg1863192#msg1863192 date=1194072845]

If you read i put in my eyes, these people are important.
[/quote]kiss more arse
[/quote]no… that might be the kind of thing you like doing, but i dont do anything like that.
[/quote]you are quite obviously in denial of being a moron, then

Wait, Where the fuck did you come from in this situation? you just sprung out of the blue like a bad smell.

frank_ is awesome like that, he may do what he pleases. One more thing, don’t capitalize after you put a comma, it is incorrect grammar. Also, Capitalize after a Question mark. One last thing, don’t randomly place commas, it doesn’t make you look like you look like a cunning linguist, it just makes you look like a cunt. It also helps to put a period at the end of a sentence.

EDIT: As for me, I wasn’t on much so I missed this topic, anyways, Happy Late Birthday Ron.[/quote]
I can type how i want to type thank you.

Read full topic

item.title: You missed ron's b-day omfg!
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

[quote=“xxlegitxx, post:72, topic:155444”][quote author=ThAt0n36Uy link=topic=212191.msg1863358#msg1863358 date=1194075671]
frank_ is awesome like that, he may do what he pleases. One more thing, don’t capitalize after you put a comma, it is incorrect grammar. Also, Capitalize after a Question mark. One last thing, don’t randomly place commas, it doesn’t make you look like you look like a cunning linguist, it just makes you look like a cunt. It also helps to put a period at the end of a sentence.

EDIT: As for me, I wasn’t on much so I missed this topic, anyways, Happy Late Birthday Ron.
[/quote]

No need to be an ass.

Semicolons separate two complete clauses. “frank_ is awesome like that; he may do as he pleases.” There should be a colon after “One more thing.” Put a semicolon after “you put a comma.” Don’t capitalize in the middle of a sentence unless it deserves capitalization. Nice run-on sentence starting with “One last thing.” That’s three complete clauses with only commas. Not a single conjunction to be found. [/quote]

Like you said earlier in the topic, we’re all hypocrites. I know I am, thank you for passing on some of your knowledge to me. I guess I was pretty rude, but he could put more effort into his posts, that’s what bothered me so much.

Read full topic

It also helps to put a period at the end of a sentence.

EDIT: As for me, I wasn’t on much so I missed this topic, anyways, Happy Late Birthday Ron.[/quote]

No need to be an ass.

Semicolons separate two complete clauses. “frank_ is awesome like that; he may do as he pleases.” There should be a colon after “One more thing.” Put a semicolon after “you put a comma.” Don’t capitalize in the middle of a sentence unless it deserves capitalization. Nice run-on sentence starting with “One last thing.” That’s three complete clauses with only commas. Not a single conjunction to be found.

item.title: You missed ron's b-day omfg!
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

[quote=“Lothy, post:58, topic:155444”]Personally I don’t believe that it matters. Birthday topics aren’t the nuisance that some of you are making them out to be. If someone wants to make a topic for someone else, then so be it. =\

Happy birthday Ron. Have a good one.[/quote]

We’re a bunch of hypocrites. We argue with people who double post, debate about the relevance of a topic, and criticize people who ask naive questions, when the double post did less damage than the flame, the debate was more off-topic than the topic itself, and the flaming responses were no better than the naive questions.

I blame it all on Algas.

Read full topic
